Installation¶

Users can clone and build the repository locally or install Quasildr through conda/pip.

Please use Quasildr with Python 3.6+.

## Dependencies

## Installing with Anaconda

To install with conda (recommended for Linux users), run the following command in your terminal: ` conda install -c bioconda quasildr `

### Installing selene with pip:

`sh pip install quasildr `

## Installing from source

Selene can also be installed from source. First, download the latest commits from the source repository: ` git clone https://github.com/jzthree/quasildr.git `

If you would like to locally install Selene, you can run `sh python setup.py install `
